content:
TransferContext TransferContext Class

In this Article

Edit

Represents the context for a transfer, and provides additional runtime information about its execution.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class TransferContextPublic MustInherit Class TransferContext

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
    Object
  • TransferContext
    TransferContext
  • DirectoryTransferContext
    DirectoryTransferContext
  • SingleTransferContext
    SingleTransferContext

Initializes a new instance of the TransferContext class.

Initializes a new instance of the TransferContext class.

Initializes a new instance of the TransferContext class.

Properties summary

ClientRequestId
ClientRequestId

Gets or sets the client request id.
LastCheckpoint
LastCheckpoint

Gets the last checkpoint of the transfer.
LogLevel
LogLevel

Gets or sets the logging level to be used for the related transfer operation.
ProgressHandler
ProgressHandler

Gets or sets the progress update handler.
SetAttributesCallback
SetAttributesCallback

Gets or sets the callback invoked to set destination's attributes in memory. The attributes set in this callback will be sent to azure storage service.

ShouldOverwriteCallback
ShouldOverwriteCallback

Gets or sets the callback invoked to tell whether to overwrite an existing destination.

Methods summary

ForceOverwrite(Object, Object)
ForceOverwrite(Object, Object)

Callback used to force overwrite the destination without existence check. It can be used when destination credentials only contains write permission.

Events summary

FileFailed
FileFailed

The event triggered when a file transfer is failed.
FileSkipped
FileSkipped

The event triggered when a file transfer is skipped.
FileTransferred
FileTransferred

The event triggered when a file transfer is completed successfully.

    TransferContext()

    Initializes a new instance of the TransferContext class.

    protected TransferContext()Protected Sub New
  • Edit
    TransferContext(TransferCheckpoint)
    TransferContext(TransferCheckpoint)

    Initializes a new instance of the TransferContext class.

    protected TransferContext(TransferCheckpoint checkpoint)Protected Sub New(checkpoint As TransferCheckpoint)

    Parameters

    • checkpoint
      TransferCheckpoint
      TransferCheckpoint

      An TransferCheckpoint object representing the last checkpoint from which the transfer continues on.

  • Edit
    TransferContext(Stream)
    TransferContext(Stream)

    Initializes a new instance of the TransferContext class.

    protected TransferContext(Stream journalStream)Protected Sub New(journalStream As Stream)

    Parameters

    • journalStream
      Stream
      Stream

      The stream into which the transfer journal info will be written into. It can resume the previours paused transfer from its journal stream.

Properties

  • Edit
    ClientRequestId
    ClientRequestId

    Gets or sets the client request id.

    public string ClientRequestId { get; set; }Public Property ClientRequestId As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

      A string containing the client request id.

    Remarks

    Setting this property modifies all the requests involved in the related transfer operation to include the the HTTP x-ms-client-request-id header.

  • Edit
    LastCheckpoint
    LastCheckpoint

    Gets the last checkpoint of the transfer.

    public TransferCheckpoint LastCheckpoint { get; }Public ReadOnly Property LastCheckpoint As TransferCheckpoint

    Property Value

    • TransferCheckpoint
      TransferCheckpoint

    LogLevel

    Gets or sets the logging level to be used for the related transfer operation.

    public LogLevel LogLevel { get; set; }Public Property LogLevel As LogLevel

    Property Value

    • System.LogLevel
      System.LogLevel

      A value of type that specifies which events are logged for the related transfer operation.

  • Edit
    ProgressHandler
    ProgressHandler

    Gets or sets the progress update handler.

    public IProgress<TransferStatus> ProgressHandler { get; set; }Public Property ProgressHandler As IProgress(Of TransferStatus)

      IProgress(Of TransferStatus)

    SetAttributesCallback

    Gets or sets the callback invoked to set destination's attributes in memory. The attributes set in this callback will be sent to azure storage service.

    Gets or sets the callback invoked to tell whether to overwrite an existing destination.

    Property Value

    • ShouldOverwriteCallback
      ShouldOverwriteCallback

Methods

  • Edit
    ForceOverwrite(Object, Object)
    ForceOverwrite(Object, Object)

    Callback used to force overwrite the destination without existence check. It can be used when destination credentials only contains write permission.

    public static bool ForceOverwrite(object source, object destination)Public Shared Function ForceOverwrite(source As Object, destination As Object) As Boolean

    Parameters

    • source
      Object
      Object

      Instance of source used to overwrite the destination.

    • destination
      Object
      Object

      Instance of destination to be overwritten.

    Returns

    • Boolean
      Boolean

      True if the file should be overwritten; otherwise false.

    Remarks

    Read permission is still required in destination credentials in serivce side copy for copy status monitoring.

    FileFailed

    The event triggered when a file transfer is failed.

    The event triggered when a file transfer is completed successfully.
